dcterms:description: The IWSLT15 English→Vietnamese dataset is used for evaluating simultaneous machine translation methods, specifically focusing on the translation from English to Vietnamese.
dcterms:title: IWSLT15 English→Vietnamese (En→Vi)

dcterms:description: The WMT15 German→English dataset is utilized for evaluating simultaneous machine translation methods, particularly focusing on the translation from German to English.
